shortName.description: unique globally; if not set: use name

matrix.$comment: This file is used by another schema file and should not be used directly as a JSON schema.

oneOf.$comment: position divisible by number with remainder

pixelCount.description: amount of pixels in X, Y and Z directions

pixelKeys.description: pixelKeys in a structure of arrays for the Z, Y and X directions

items.$comment: pattern that pixel keys should match
This file is used by another schema file and should not be used directly as a JSON schema.

additionalProperties.$comment: This file is used by another schema file and should not be used directly as a JSON schema.

name.description: if not set: use channel key

oneOf.$comment: maximum depends on how many fine channels there are (255 if none, 65535 if one, etc.)

allOf.$comment: This file is used by another schema file and should not be used directly as a JSON schema.

oneOf.$comment: channel key or channel alias key
template channel key or template channel alias key

then.$comment: wheel must be a single wheel

else.$comment: wheel can be a single wheel or multiple wheels

else.$comment: wheel can be a single wheel or multiple wheels

then.$comment: defaultValue must be set and all capabilities have to set switchChannels

if.$comment: channel contains only one NoFunction capability

oneOf.$comment: normal channel keys, resolved template channel keys or channel alias keys
